dimensions: H x W (approx.): 132.1 x 101.6 cm (52 x 40 in.)
title: Kepenek (shepherd's cloak)
provenance: Provenance: Chris Martens, one of the authors of the Fashioning Felt catalogue, asked Mehmet Gircic, a carpet maker in Istanbul, to procure a kepenek for the exhibiton. He commissioned the piece from the Konya feltmaker Kececi Osman.
description: Cloak with broadly rounded shoulders in natural wool white, with a pattern band down each side front in black. Center front opening.
name: Kepenek (shepherd's cloak)
